channel.title: Clue (Noob) Help
channel.description: How do i make it so that when i read the clue scroll it shows an interface of my choice?

item.title: Clue (Noob) Help
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“tomjrmkay, post:2, topic:230925”][code]public void cluescroll()
{

				sendQuest("TITLE", 8144);  //Title
				clearQuestInterface();
				sendQuest("SUBTITLE", 8145);
				sendQuest("----", 8147);
                			             sendQuest("words", 8148);
				sendQuest("words", 8149);
				sendQuest("words", 8150);
                                    sendQuest("words", 8151);
                                    sendQuest("words", 8152);
                                    sendQuest("words,", 8153);
                                    sendQuest("words", 8154);
                                    sendQuest("words", 8155);
                                    sendQuest("words", 8156);
	  			sendQuest("words", 8157);
	  			sendQuest("words", 8158);
                                    sendQuest("words", 8159);
				sendQuestSomething(8143);
				showInterface(8134);
				flushOutStream();
                               }[/code]

then
case CLUESCROLL#: {
cluescroll();
}
break;[/quote]
A case cannot be a case without a break.
Me thinks.

Read full topic

item.title: Clue (Noob) Help
item.dc:creator: @tomjrmkay tomjrmkay
item.description:
@tomjrmkay wrote:

[code]public void cluescroll()
{

				sendQuest("TITLE", 8144);  //Title
				clearQuestInterface();
				sendQuest("SUBTITLE", 8145);
				sendQuest("----", 8147);
                			             sendQuest("words", 8148);
				sendQuest("words", 8149);
				sendQuest("words", 8150);
                                    sendQuest("words", 8151);
                                    sendQuest("words", 8152);
                                    sendQuest("words,", 8153);
                                    sendQuest("words", 8154);
                                    sendQuest("words", 8155);
                                    sendQuest("words", 8156);
	  			sendQuest("words", 8157);
	  			sendQuest("words", 8158);
                                    sendQuest("words", 8159);
				sendQuestSomething(8143);
				showInterface(8134);
				flushOutStream();
                               }[/code]

then

case CLUESCROLL#: { cluescroll(); }
